Weird abbrieviation

If you are running firefox as your primary web-browser you'll probably be familiar with the Mozilla Foundation who look after firefox distribution. You might also have potentially shortened their name to the unlikely MoFo - hilarious!!

But not so funny as the legal firm Morrison & Foerster which share the unlikely abbrieviation (www.mofo.com). This gets even funnier when you run across one of the internal press releases which reads (and I kid you not) "MoFo One of 100 Best Companies for Working Mothers". Absolutely side splitting - at least to a dirty minded individual such as myself.
